item.title: 越南航空达成9.65亿美元融资协议，购入6架波音737-8飞机
item.description: 越南廉价航空公司越捷航空周四宣布，已与格里芬全球资产管理公司签署价值9.65亿美元的融资协议，用于购买6架波音737-8型飞机。【原文：Vietnamese budget airline Vietjet has signed a $965 million financing deal with Griffin Global Asset Management for the purchase of 6 Boeing 737-8 aircraft, it said on Thursday.】

item.title: 印尼与美国企业签署逾70亿美元贸易投资协议
item.description: 美国-东盟商业理事会表示，印尼与美国企业周三签署了价值逾70亿美元的贸易和投资协议，此举正值印尼总统普拉博沃·苏比安托与美国总统唐纳德·特朗普会晤前夕，双方将于次日签署最终贸易协议。【原文：Indonesian and U.S. companies on Wednesday signed trade and investment deals valued at more than $7 billion a day ahead of Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto's meeting with U.S. President Donald Trump to sign a final trade deal, the U.S.-ASEAN Business Council said.】

item.title: 美元走强，因美联储似乎无意急于降息
item.description: 周四美元汇率脱离近期低点，在反弹后维持涨势。美联储会议纪要显示，政策制定者似乎并不急于降息，且若通胀持续顽固，部分成员持加息立场。【原文：The dollar was off recent lows on Thursday and hanging on to a bounce after minutes from the Federal Reserve showed policymakers did not seem to be in a rush to cut interest rates and that several were open to hikes if inflation proved sticky.】

item.title: 美国司法部调查华纳兄弟拟议出售对影院的影响，彭博新闻报道
item.description: 据彭博社周三报道，美国司法部已召集国内多家大型影院连锁企业进行非公开会谈，讨论华纳兄弟探索公司出售案可能产生的影响。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department has summoned some of the country's major theater chains to private conversations about the potential impact of a sale of Warner Bros Discovery, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据《信息报》报道，Meta重启智能手表计划，目标2026年推出
item.description: 据《信息报》周三报道，Instagram母公司Meta Platforms计划今年推出首款智能手表，消息源自两位知情人士。【原文：Instagram-owner Meta Platforms plans to release its first smartwatch this year, the Information reported on Wednesday, citing two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国机构起诉可口可乐装瓶商，因员工活动排除男性参与
item.description: 美国民权机构起诉可口可乐产品装瓶商和分销商，指控其在员工联谊活动中排斥男性构成性别歧视。这是自特朗普总统上任以来，该机构首次就职场多元化计划提起诉讼。【原文：A U.S. civil rights agency has sued a bottler and distributor of Coca-Cola products it accuses of sex discrimination over an employee networking event that excluded men, its first lawsuit over workplace diversity programs since President Donald Trump took office.】

item.title: Atlassian任命领英资深高管James Chuong为首席财务官
item.description: Atlassian周三宣布任命James Chuong为新任首席财务官，自3月30日起生效，接替Joe Binz的职位。【原文：Atlassian on Wednesday named James Chuong as its new chief financial officer, effective March 30, taking over from Joe Binz.】

item.title: 摩尔森库尔斯预测2026年利润将大幅下滑，铝材成本持续攀升
item.description: 啤酒制造商摩森康胜周三预测年度利润将大幅下滑，原因是铝关税提高以及价格敏感型消费者支出疲软。【原文：Beer maker Molson Coors forecast a sharp drop in annual profit on Wednesday, hurt by higher aluminum tariffs and weak spending among price-sensitive consumers.】

item.title: 英国将实施48小时在线删除规则，针对未经同意的私密影像
item.description: 英国将要求科技公司必须在48小时内删除未经同意在网上传播的私密影像，否则将面临最高达全球合格收入10%的罚款，甚至可能导致其服务被封禁。【原文：Britain will require technology companies to take down intimate images shared online without consent within 48 hours or else face fines of up to 10% of eligible global revenue, and even risk having their services blocked.】

item.title: 交易日华尔街涨势消退，欧洲股市收于历史新高；原油因供应担忧而飙升
item.description: 周三美国股市追随欧洲股市上涨，但随着交易时段推进，涨势有所减弱；而持续的地缘政治冲突则推动原油和黄金价格反弹。【原文：U.S. stocks chased their European counterparts higher on Wednesday, but lost some momentum as the session progressed, while ongoing geopolitical strife helped prompt a rebound in crude and gold prices.】

item.title: 麦迪逊广场花园体育公司股价创历史新高，正探索将尼克斯队和游骑兵队分拆上市
item.description: 麦迪逊广场花园体育公司周三股价飙升逾16%，创下历史新高。此前该公司宣布已批准一项计划，将探索可能的分拆方案，将旗下纽约尼克斯队业务与纽约游骑兵队业务分离。【原文：Shares of Madison Square Garden Sports rose more than 16% to hit a record high on Wednesday after the company said it has approved a plan to explore a possible spinoff to separate its New York Knicks franchise from its New York Rangers businesses.】

item.title: 博克集团季度利润超预期，国际旅行需求保持稳定
item.description: 在线旅游巨头Booking Holdings周三公布的第四季度利润超出华尔街预期，得益于国际旅游需求的强劲表现，其股价在盘后交易中上涨2%。【原文：Online travel agency Booking Holdings beat Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday amid resilient international travel demand, sending its shares up 2% in extended trading.】

item.title: 富时罗素就美国股票指数快速纳入规则征询意见，为大型IPO做准备
item.description: 富时罗素指数公司周三表示，正就可能推出的快速上市规则及罗素美国股票指数的最低准入要求征询市场意见。此举旨在应对2026年预期中的多起大型IPO，包括SpaceX、OpenAI和Anthropic的上市计划。【原文：Index provider FTSE Russell said on Wednesday that it is seeking market feedback on the potential introduction of a fast-entry IPO rule and minimum eligibility requirements for Russell U.S. Equity Indexes in anticipation of several large IPOs expected in 2026, including those of SpaceX, OpenAI and Anthropic.】

item.title: 美国法官驳回Live Nation要求驳回票价反垄断诉讼的申请
item.description: 周三，一名联邦法官驳回了Live Nation娱乐公司要求驳回联邦政府及多个美国州政府诉讼的申请。该诉讼指控该公司试图垄断现场音乐会行业并抬高票价，涉嫌违反反垄断法。【原文：A federal judge on Wednesday rejected Live Nation Entertainment's bid to dismiss a lawsuit by the federal government and many U.S. states accusing the company of violating antitrust law by trying to dominate the live concert industry and inflate prices.】

item.title: 蓝猫公司向养老金和保险投资者出售14亿美元债务基金
item.description: 私募股权公司蓝猫资本周三表示，正出售旗下三只信贷基金价值14亿美元的资产，以向投资者返还资本并偿还债务。该公司股价过去一年已下跌逾半。当前，直接贷款和软件类股正面临日益增大的压力。【原文：Private capital firm Blue Owl Capital , whose shares have halved over the last year, is selling $1.4 billion in assets from three of its credit funds so it can return capital to investors and pay down debt, the company said Wednesday, as direct lending and software stocks come under increasing pressure.】

item.title: 澳大利亚威斯法默斯公司股价下跌，因高昂生活成本抑制了下半年开局表现
item.description: 澳大利亚最大非食品零售商Wesfarmers的股价周四创下三个多月来最大跌幅，此前该公司报告称，由于消费者持续面临高昂的生活成本，其下半年开局表现低于预期。【原文：Shares of Wesfarmers , Australia's biggest non-food retailer, fell by their most in over three months on Thursday after reporting a weaker-than-expected start to the second-half as consumers grappled with persistent high living costs.】

item.title: eBay预计第一季度营收将超出预期
item.description: eBay公司周三预测第一季度营收将超出华尔街预期，表明其对奢侈品和汽车零部件等专业品类的聚焦策略，正助力其在充满挑战的电商市场中稳步前行。【原文：EBay Inc forecast first-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, signaling that its focus on specialty categories like luxury goods and auto parts is helping it navigate a challenging e-commerce market.】

item.title: Carvana第四季度利润因二手车需求激增而大幅攀升
item.description: 卡瓦纳周三公布第四季度利润和营收双增长，这家在线零售商受益于美国民众对二手车强劲的需求——民众正面临生活成本上涨和关税的连锁反应。【原文：Carvana reported higher fourth-quarter profit and revenue on Wednesday, as the online retailer benefited from strong demand for preowned vehicles from Americans battling higher cost of living and the trickle-down effects of tariffs.】

item.title: 菲格玛凭借强劲的设计势头预测全年营收向好，股价上涨
item.description: Figma周三公布的年度营收预期超出华尔街预期，这家设计软件制造商预计需求强劲，并押注其扩大用户群的努力，推动其股价在盘后交易中上涨约15%。【原文：Figma forecast annual revenue above Wall Street expectations on Wednesday, as the design software maker anticipates robust demand and bets on its efforts to expand its user base, sending its shares up around 15% in extended trading.】

item.title: DoorDash预测季度利润低于预期，因技术改造支出增加
item.description: 外卖公司DoorDash预测第一季度调整后利润低于华尔街预期，原因是其在技术平台重大改造上的支出，而此时消费者对非必需品消费仍持谨慎态度。【原文：Food delivery company DoorDash forecast first-quarter adjusted profit below Wall Street estimates, hurt by spending on a major overhaul of its technology platform at a time when consumers remain cautious on discretionary purchases.】

item.title: 美联储称上月"利率检查"系应财政部要求
item.description: 美国央行周三证实，上月应美国财政部要求，曾向交易商征询美元兑日元汇率报价。这一不同寻常的举动强化了日元持续疲软的态势，并使投资者警惕美日两国可能实施15年来首次联合干预外汇市场的行动。【原文：The U.S. central bank on Wednesday confirmed it had asked dealers last month for quotes on dollar/yen rates at the behest of the U.S. Treasury, an unusual move that strengthened the stubbornly weak yen and put investors on alert for the first joint U.S.-Japan currency intervention in 15 years.】

item.title: 独家：美国计划建立在线门户网站，以规避欧洲及其他地区的内容禁令
item.description: 美国国务院正在开发一个在线门户网站，该网站将使欧洲及其他地区的人们能够查看被其政府封禁的内容，包括被指控的仇恨言论和恐怖主义宣传。三位熟悉该计划的消息人士称，华盛顿方面将此举视为对抗审查制度的一种方式。【原文：The U.S. State Department is developing an online portal that will enable people in Europe and elsewhere to see content banned by their governments including alleged hate speech and terrorist propaganda, a move Washington views as a way to counter censorship, three sources familiar with the plan said.】

item.title: 美国法官禁止前Palantir员工为新人工智能公司挖角
item.description: 曼哈顿一名联邦法官周三批准了Palantir Technologies公司的申请，禁止该公司前副总裁兼高级工程师招揽其员工加入他们去年创立的竞争对手公司Percepta AI。【原文：A federal judge in Manhattan on Wednesday granted Palantir Technologies' bid to block a former vice president and senior engineer from soliciting its employees to join the competing company they launched last year, Percepta AI.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利为爱泼斯坦信托基金开设账户的行为持续至2019年
item.description: 美国司法部公布的文件显示，摩根士丹利在2015年至2019年期间为杰弗里·爱泼斯坦的信托基金开设账户。而早在2008年，这位金融家就已根据认罪协议被定罪并登记为性犯罪者。【原文：Morgan Stanley opened accounts for Jeffrey Epstein's trusts between 2015 and 2019, years after the financier was convicted and registered as a sex offender under a 2008 plea deal, documents released by the U.S. Justice Department show.】

item.title: 澳大利亚电信公司Telstra下调全年业绩预期，中期利润超预期
item.description: 澳大利亚电信集团周四公布的半年利润超出预期，得益于其移动业务板块和成本控制，同时下调了2026财年的盈利预期。【原文：Australia's Telstra Group's half-year profit beat estimates on Thursday, supported by its mobile business segment and cost control, while tightening its earnings forecast for fiscal 2026.】

item.title: 墨西哥沃尔玛旗下沃尔玛墨西哥公司第四季度利润下滑4%，低于预期
item.description: 沃尔玛旗下墨西哥及中美洲业务部门Walmex（股票代码：WALMEX.MX）周三公布，其第四季度净利润较2024年同期下滑3.9%，未达分析师预期。【原文：Walmart's Mexico and Central America unit Walmex WALMEX.MXon Wednesday reported a 3.9% drop in its fourth-quarter net profit compared to the same period in 2024, missing analysts' forecasts.】

item.title: 德国政治家梅尔茨加入呼吁限制儿童使用社交媒体的行列
item.description: 德国财政部长弗里德里希·默茨支持国内日益高涨的呼声，主张对儿童使用社交媒体平台实施管控。他表示，鉴于虚假新闻的蓄意传播及其他网络操纵手段造成的危害证据日益充分，他越来越确信有必要实施强制性限制措施。【原文：Chancellor Friedrich Merz backed growing calls in Germany for controls on access to social media platforms by children, saying he had become increasingly persuaded of the need for compulsory limits by evidence of the harm done by the deliberate spreading of fake news and other forms of online manipulation.】

item.title: 联邦通信委员会主席支持Nexstar与Tegna合并案
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会主席周三表示，他支持Nexstar以35.4亿美元收购Tegna的提议，该交易完成后合并后的实体将成为美国最大的区域性电视台运营商。【原文：The chair of the Federal Communications Commission said Wednesday he supports Nexstar's proposed $3.54 billion acquisition of Tegna that would make the combined entity the largest U.S. regional TV station operator.】

item.title: 美联储会议纪要淡化特朗普购房计划对住房可负担性的影响
item.description: 特朗普政府为降低住房贷款成本所做的努力迄今收效甚微，美联储周三公布的1月27日至28日会议纪要显示。【原文：An effort launched by the Trump administration to improve home borrowing costs is not coming to much so far, meeting minutes from the Federal Reserve’s January 27-28 meeting, released on Wednesday, said.】

item.title: 铜价因逢低买盘而攀升，科技股复苏
item.description: 周三铜价走高，从前一交易日逾一周低点反弹，因投资者逢低买入，且工业金属价格跟随科技股反弹走势。【原文：Copper rose higher on Wednesday, bouncing back from a more than one-week low in the previous session, as investors stepped in to buy the dip and as industrial metals prices tracked a rebound in tech stocks.】
